name: CEN/TC 434 - Electronic Invoicing
goal: The CEN Technical Committee CEN/TC 434 on Electronic Invoicing develops standards on electronic invoicing and developed the deliverables described in the standardization request by the European Commission (in support of Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement). These standard are needed to support the exchange of information by electronic means in support of business processes in the trade of goods and services.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement
